page.title: 19Developments
page.content: Banff is changing all the time.Old buildings are being put to new uses and new houses and shops are either being built or are planned for the near future. The two most important developments under way at present are the building of a Fine Fare hypermarket by the river,and of a William Low supermarket in the Bridge Street area. When these are finished early in 1986,they will have a big effect on shopping in the town. A sheltered housing unit has been opened near the Deveronvale football pitch.An old building in High Street is being turned into flats by a private builder. Our newest street is Albert Place-47 houses built by the District Council. Some new private housing is also being built in Banff and Macduff.
